ps2.9:2.2: saddhābalaṁ, vīriyabalaṁ, satibalaṁ, samādhibalaṁ, paññābalaṁ, hiribalaṁ, ottappabalaṁ, paṭisaṅkhānabalaṁ, bhāvanābalaṁ, anavajjabalaṁ, saṅgahabalaṁ, khantibalaṁ, paññattibalaṁ, nijjhattibalaṁ, issariyabalaṁ, adhiṭṭhānabalaṁ, samathabalaṁ, vipassanābalaṁ, dasa sekhabalāni, dasa asekhabalāni, dasa khīṇāsavabalāni, dasa iddhibalāni, dasa tathāgatabalāni”.
ps2.9:3.3: Sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ, kilesānaṁ pariyādānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ, paṭivedhādivisodhanaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ, cittassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ, cittassa vodānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ, visesādhigamaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ, uttaripaṭivedhaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ, saccābhisamayaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena saddhābalaṁ.
ps2.9:4.3: Sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ, kilesānaṁ pariyādānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ, paṭivedhādivisodhanaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ, cittassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ, cittassa vodānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ, visesādhigamaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ, uttaripaṭivedhaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ, saccābhisamayaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṁ.
ps2.9:11.9: Nīvaraṇe pajahanto paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ bhāvetīti— bhāvanābalaṁ …pe…
ps2.9:12.2: Kāmacchandassa pahīnattā nekkhamme natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṁ.
ps2.9:12.3: Byāpādassa pahīnattā abyāpāde natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṁ.
ps2.9:12.4: Thinamiddhassa pahīnattā ālokasaññāya natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṁ.
ps2.9:12.5: Uddhaccassa pahīnattā avikkhepe natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṁ.
ps2.9:12.6: Vicikicchāya pahīnattā dhammavavatthāne natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṁ.
ps2.9:12.7: Avijjāya pahīnattā ñāṇe natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṁ.
ps2.9:12.8: Aratiyā pahīnattā pāmojje natthi kiñci vajjanti anavajjabalaṁ.
ps2.9:12.9: Nīvaraṇānaṁ pahīnattā paṭhamajjhāne natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṁ …pe…
ps2.9:12.10: sabbakilesānaṁ pahīnattā arahattamagge natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṁ.

ps2.9:16.4: Thinamiddhaṁ pajahanto ālokasaññāvasena cittaṁ nijjhāpetīti— nijjhattibalaṁ …pe…
ps2.9:17.2: Kāmacchandaṁ pajahanto nekkhammavasena cittaṁ vasaṁ vattetīti—issariyabalaṁ.
ps2.9:17.3: Byāpādaṁ pajahanto abyāpādavasena cittaṁ vasaṁ vattetīti—issariyabalaṁ.
ps2.9:17.4: Thinamiddhaṁ pajahanto ālokasaññāvasena cittaṁ vasaṁ vattetīti— issariyabalaṁ …pe…
ps2.9:17.5: sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggavasena cittaṁ vasaṁ vattetīti—issariyabalaṁ.
ps2.9:18.4: Thinamiddhaṁ pajahanto ālokasaññāvasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhātīti— adhiṭṭhānabalaṁ …pe…
ps2.9:19.2: Nekkhammavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṁ, abyāpādavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṁ, ālokasaññāvasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṁ …pe…
ps2.9:19.3: paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṁ, paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṁ.
ps2.9:20.2: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇe na kampatīti— samathabalaṁ.
ps2.9:20.6: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya na kampatīti—samathabalaṁ.
ps2.9:20.10: Uddhacce ca uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti—samathabalaṁ.
ps2.9:21.3: paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābalaṁ, rūpe aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṁ, rūpe dukkhānupassanā vipassanābalaṁ …pe…
ps2.9:21.9: jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṁ, jarāmaraṇe dukkhānupassanā vipassanābalaṁ …pe…
ps2.9:21.19: Avijjāya ca avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti— vipassanābalaṁ.
ps2.9:23.2: Idha khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps2.9:23.3: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti.
ps2.9:24.1: Puna caparaṁ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps2.9:24.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti.
ps2.9:25.1: Puna caparaṁ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṁ cittaṁ hoti vivekapoṇaṁ vivekapabbhāraṁ vivekaṭṭhaṁ nekkhammābhirataṁ byantībhūtaṁ sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi.
ps2.9:25.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṁ cittaṁ hoti vivekapoṇaṁ vivekapabbhāraṁ vivekaṭṭhaṁ nekkhammābhirataṁ byantībhūtaṁ sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti.
ps2.9:26.1: Puna caparaṁ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā.
ps2.9:26.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti.
ps2.9:27.1: Puna caparaṁ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā …pe…
ps2.9:27.6: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito.
ps2.9:27.7: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti.
ps2.9:28.2: Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammā payogappaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi—
ps2.9:29.2: Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
ps2.9:29.3: Yampi tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti parisāsu sīhanādaṁ nadati, brahmacakkaṁ pavatteti.
ps2.9:30.1: Puna caparaṁ tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
ps2.9:30.2: Yampi tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṁ, nadati, brahmacakkaṁ pavatteti.

ps2.9:31.2: Yampi tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṁ nadati, brahmacakkaṁ pavatteti.

ps2.9:38.2: Yampi tathāgato āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṁ nadati, brahmacakkaṁ pavatteti.
